puzzles.name: Mate in 1 - Queen Takes Pawn
puzzles.description: White to move and mate in 1. The queen takes the pawn, and the black king on h8 is checkmated — it can't move anywhere, and no piece can block or capture.

moves_detailed.description: The queen takes the pawn, and the black king on h8 is checkmated — it can't move anywhere, and no piece can block or capture

puzzles.name: Mate in 1 - Rook Checkmate
puzzles.description: Black to move and mate in 1. The black rook moves from b2 to b1 to deliver checkmate to the white king on g1.

moves_detailed.description: The black rook moves from b2 to b1 to deliver checkmate to the white king on g1

puzzles.name: Mate in 1 - Rook Checkmate
puzzles.description: White to move and mate in 1. The white rook moves from f1 to h1 to deliver checkmate to the black king on h4.

moves_detailed.description: The white rook moves from f1 to h1 to deliver checkmate to the black king on h4
